law.text: No person shall stop, stand, or park any vehicle except official law enforcement vehicles in any area described as a police vehicle parking zone in official Traffic Schedule No. 23. A police vehicle includes but is not limited to any car, truck, trailer, motorcycle, van or any combination of the above used for the purpose of enforcing the laws, ordinances and regulations of the City of Raleigh. (Ord. No. 2001-973, ยง1, 4-3-01)
